reviewText: DVD arrived as advertised and in perfect condition. I've enjoyed watching this movie over and over again. Can't wait to share it with others.
Very good, a little dragged out, but very good family movie. Anyone looking for something that will entertain the entire family, this would be that movie.  Good, clean, happy ending.

I haven't always watched movies about African-Americans because they were so put-upon it depressed me.  But seeing this on Hallmark made me realize I needed to own it.  L.J. stole my heart and it was a joy to watch his relationship with his grandfather. It's a good-feeling movie.

Little John is a film of a family torn  apart and coming back together. Patty Duke is a law clerk for a judge,and offers good advice. This is worth your time to watch, be patient and you will like it. I love it !
I LOVE THIS MOVIE SO MUCH......EXCELLENT.MY WHOLE FAMILY LOVE THIS MOVIE NOW MY TRIPLET NEPHEWS LOVE TO WATCH EVERY TIME THEY COME OVER.

This story is a heartwarming story of love between a man and his daughter and grandson. However, the clincher is: the daughter doesn't know that her father even knows the grandson, because she gave the baby up for adoption and she doesn't realize that her own father adopted him. The story shows the harm that miscommunication can do, but how the deep roots of love in a mother's heart break down the barriers.
A great family story!!!!!!!  Family, healing, growing and discovering love, forgiveness and wholeness which we need in our lives.  Love at its best!

I bought this as a gift for my parents and they haven't stopped talking about it.  My 'busy' uncle even stopped to enjoy this one.  It is AWFULLY GOOD!!!

BUY and add to your collection, you won't be sorry.  All the actors were great.
This product came faster than some of the other things I ordered before this movie. The movie arrived in perfect condition as promised. I will use this seller again for sure.

I LOVE this movie! So sweet. It's a typical feel good Hallmark movie. Family friendly and a great choice for a sweet date movie. You won't regret the time spent watching this movie! Robert Bailey Jr. shines as Little John!
Awesome movie - really hits home as to family and what is important in life.  Great actors, very realistic plot!
This is one of the best family feature movies I have seen in a while.  Its a movie about life issues of family, their struggles, their past mistakes and the power of forgiveness and second chances.
I was delighted to see that you had the dvd, Little John.  I have watched this movie many times on the Hallmark channel and wanted my own copy.
What a movie, saw it on regular TV and had to have it for my collection.  It is great to watch over and over.  Love it.
I am a big fan of Ving Rhames, Gloria Reuben and Patty Duke Astin.  I wish I had discovered this movie sooner.  I would have sent as a Mother's Day gift.
I first saw this movie on tv and it left me in tears. It was a very good heart warming movie. The shipping was also very fast. I would recommend buying from this seller.
We usually love most Hallmark movies, but this one is especially good.  With fractured families today, this movie is especially timely in its message of forgiveness and reconciliation.
